scripts.postinstall: echo '⬇️ Installing yt-dlp + ffmpeg...' && curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o ./yt-dlp && chmod +x ./yt-dlp && curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz -o ./ffmpeg.tar.xz && tar -xJf ./ffmpeg.tar.xz --strip-components=1 -C ./ && mv ./ffmpeg ./ffmpeg-bin && chmod +x ./ffmpeg-bin && echo '✅ yt-dlp + ffmpeg installed'
